name: GitHub Webhook
description: Receives GitHub webhook events and dispatches them as system events to the agent session.

secret.description: HMAC SHA-256 webhook secret for signature verification

repos.description: Filter: only process events from these repos (owner/name). Empty = all.

mentionFilter.description: Only dispatch comments that mention this username (e.g. a0a1-aone). Empty = all comments.

hooksPort.description: Port of the OpenClaw hooks server (default: 3001)

hooksToken.description: Token for authenticating with the OpenClaw /hooks/agent endpoint

hooksPath.description: Base path of the OpenClaw hooks endpoint (default: /hooks)

pemPath.description: Path to GitHub App private key PEM file

agentName.description: Agent identity: 'one' or 'zero'. Only reacts to matching !commands.
